attributes.action: We the people of this planet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Can some of the unclaimed money of the national lottery be used to buy up rainforest land where ever in the world 
to stop land clearing and logging legal or otherwise and perhaps plant native species of trees to give the world back its lungs.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
